title: Quirky and fun!!!
review:
It's an offbeat quirky semi black comedy that I enjoyed. Sure it won't be for everyone, hardly any movie is. If you like antipodean oddball humour and your OK watcher lower budget films this is certainly worth your time. Blockbuster lovers beware... probably not your fair.

Anyhow, I enjoyed it and I think there are signs of good things to come in the future from this emerging director/producer.
